plot: Alex is looking for the woman of his life. He has sent an ad to the local newspaper, just in case... And it works! At last, the first date is set in an laundrette.
title: Ça vaut mieux pour tout le monde
plot_es: Alex is looking for the woman of his life. He has sent an ad to the local newspaper, just in case... And it works! At last, the first date is set in an laundrette.
original_name: Ça vaut mieux pour tout le monde
